page.title: 03Batchelors Factory
page.content: This factory is sited next to the P.P.F. factory. About a thousand people work there. One mother who was interviewed packs soup and Vesta meals. Dried powder is sealed in a plastic bag and then into a card container. The workers wear special uniforms, strong shoes and an overall with a cap. Hygiene and cleanliness is very important when dealing with these and any food product. The mother works 5 or 6 days a week. The factory works in three shifts throughout the day and night. Most people travel to work by car. There is a medical service in case of injury and a canteen for refreshments. There are two 15 minute tea breaks and one 30 minute dinner break.
